announcements.headline: GRAVITY STUDIOS@ GMAC !
announcements.body:
Gravity Studios is now open offering Step, Barre, Pole Fitness, TRX and personal training! Find schedule and information on Facebook at Gravity Studios @ GMAC or Tracy Waites Fitness. 
**Pole Fitness is a challenging and fun athletic class where you can build upper body and core strength in an amazing atmosphere and also make some great supportive new friends!  Try it out on Monday or Wednesday at 6 pm!**
